attack_count.description: Attack event count (0–1000, pad 4): 0 = none, 1000 = ultra-dense. Zero-padded.

attack_strength.description: Attack strength (0–10000, pad 5): 0 = soft, 10000 = sharpest. Zero-padded.

description: TRA (prefix), attack count (4 digits), attack strength (5 digits); zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: TRA012309876 = 0123 attacks, 09876 strength.
